committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To remove a restriction from a portion of a parcel of land acquired by the city of Pittsburg, California, in order for that portion to be used for a fire station.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to execute such instruments necessary to remove the restrictions that prohibit the use of a specified parcel of land in Pittsburg, California, for a public park for recreational purposes so that the city can use the land for a fire station or other public purpose.

titles.title: To remove a restriction from a portion of a parcel of land acquired by the city of Pittsburg, California, in order for that portion to be used for a fire station.
